description: Equipped with Smith’s MAG (magnetic) changing system, swapping lenses even easier than before. The rimless design gives you direct access to the lens, so you can change quickly as conditions change.Designed for large faces.Responsive Fit™ design contours of a variety of face shapes.7 N52 magnets with a locking mechanism adds security and prevents rotational. Push a lever at either side, to release.ChromaPop® lenses deliver exceptional clarity, high contrast, and colour optimization in challenging light conditions.Spherical Carbonic-X lens has crisp TLT optics and a 5X anti-fog inner lens.Thermal lens eliminates fog during rapid elevation changes.Articulating outrigger system allows for comfortable, pressure free wear, with or without a helmet.3-layer DriWix foam provides a comfortable, breathable seal.Wide, silicone backed strap has a quick-fit adjustment system and a clip buckle.Includes a spare ChromaPop Storm Rose with 50% visible light transmission.Includes an extra lens and a microfiber goggle bag.
name: Smith I/O Mag XL Goggles - Unisex
